Class Tact

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.logic.Tact
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Tact
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class Tact contains information about single tact in system node.
    Author:
    Yaroslav
